Should we even be calling checkDeletePermission() in case of views? Will leave that option to you.
Having the null check there is probably the safe thing to do either way.
+1, FWIW. The null-check makes sense to have.

Should we even be calling checkDeletePermission() in case of views?

There is the question of if the SBA authorize call makes any sense for for views. As of now, SBA does not do any special handling for views. It is an area that needs further thought. I haven't changed the core approach here. I think we can take that up separately.
